value.title: Reduce the queries being sent with Incremental Refresh in Power BI!
value.excerpt: Have you noticed some extra queries being sent when using Incremental Refresh in Power BI? Patrick explains why this could happen and a potential workaround.  Privacy Levels:  https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/enterprise/desktop-privacy-levels  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: RLS with TWO Fact tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you struggled with using Row-Level Security (RLS) on a dimension connected to two fact tables? Patrick looks at some options you can use to accomplish this in Power BI.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level?

value.title: Select All items for Parameters in Power BI Paginated reports
value.excerpt: Ever struggled with trying to get a parameter to select all items by default in a Power BI Paginated report? Patrick walks you through how to get this working! value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!

Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
